TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceReferenceExpressionConverter extends System.Windows.ExpressionConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of `ResourceReferenceExpression` to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ResourceReferenceExpression` is an internal class, so your code cannot obtain instances of the class to convert. ## XAML Text Usage
